think if there's one difference I could
possibly make in the world uh that I
would choose to make it's that I would
like to somehow give people just a
little bit better calibration on
long-term thinking because I think most
of the problems that our world face
right now is the result of short-term
thinking and the fact that it's so hard
for us to think 50 100 years or a
thousand years out and I think by giving
kids toys like like this and letting

long-term Dynamics over the short term

think personally that toys can change
